name: Maw of the Deep

effects.description: Creates whirlpool that pulls enemies, sea monster erupts for 140% base damage + 1701

Conjures a whirlpool that pulls enemies into its center, dealing 200% base damage over 3 seconds. Additionally, the whirlpool summons a sea monster dealing 400% base damage to enemies within its radius
